attributes.action: ensure funding is available for the provision of free condoms in both gay and mainstream bars.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Condoms are distributed for free in gay bars around the UK but this is not always the case for mainstream bars. Condoms are currently the only form of contraception that protects against STIs, though it is the only form of contraception not available for free on the NHS. In a society with ever-rising STI rates it is essential that the distribution of condoms covers as many people as possible.
